body.name: TeQsli Twin Mattress - 10 Inch Gel Memory Foam Hybrid Mattress in a Box for Pressure Relief and Cooling Sleep - Medium Firm Pocket Innerspring Mattress - CertiPUR-US Certified - 10-Year Support
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 17 hrs 35 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 【Relieves Pain & Pressure】- Experience ultimate comfort and support with the TEQSLI twin mattress. Featuring a combination of gel memory foam, comfort foam, and support foam, this medium-firm mattress effectively relieves pain and pressure. The reinforced edges provide extra support, ensuring a great sleeping experience.

【Cooling & Breathable Sleep】- Stay cool and comfortable all night long with the hybrid spring mattress. The gel-infused memory foam top layer and breathable knitted fabric promote air flow, keeping you cool and refreshed. Wake up feeling rejuvenated and ready to take on the day.

【Individual Pocket Springs & Motion Isolation】- Enjoy undisturbed sleep with the support system of the 10 inch mattress. The individually pocketed stainless steel spring coils adapt to your body, providing optimal support. Each pocket spring works independently, minimizing motion transfer and ensuring a peaceful sleep. Perfect for all sleep positions.

【Easy Handling & Setup】- Convenience is key with the TEQSLI mattress. It comes compressed, rolled, and packed in a box, making delivery to your door hassle-free. The mattress is easy to maneuver through narrow spaces. Simply open the box, unroll the mattress, and let it fully expand in a well-ventilated area for 72 hours.

【Buy With Confidence】- Your satisfaction is our top priority. That's why each TEQSLI mattress comes with a 100-Night Trial and a 10-Year Warranty. Rest easy knowing that the foam is CertiPUR-US certified, ensuring a healthy and peaceful sleep. If you have any questions, our dedicated TEQSLI service team is here to assist you within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Select the Ideal Mattress for Your Loved Ones TeQsli is dedicated to developing top-notch, budget-friendly products that aim to enhance the overall living experience of households worldwide. Our focus lies in creating a cozy, secure, and wellness-oriented home environment.

Unparalleled Comfort Crafted with a skin-friendly knitted fabric cover, our mattress promises a velvety and breathable sleep experience. We pride ourselves in upholding the essence of craftsmanship, ensuring that each mattress we offer epitomizes supreme quality and comfort. Original Collection Our Original Collection combines the perfect blend of cotton, memory foam, and springs to provide you with a rejuvenating night's sleep. Experience exceptional support that envelops your body in a cradle-like embrace throughout the night.

Enhanced Comfort and Support Wave memory foam conforms to your body's curves, providing effective relief from fatigue and pressure. The individually wrapped springs ensure optimal support, safeguarding against spinal pain. Motion Isolation Experience undisturbed sleep with our motion isolation solution. Say goodbye to disruptions caused by your partner's movements during the night. Comfortable & Breathable The mattress offers superior ventilation, keeping you cool. Gel-infused particles ensure a refreshing sleep. No stuffiness or discomfort; wake up energized! Double Edge Support The double edge support system features dual rows of reinforced coils and strengthened edges, effectively preventing any sagging or lack of support along the sides of the bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The bed itself is good quality, I see a lot of reviews saying firm but soft, I would say this is more on the softer side. For the price this isn’t a bad purchase but if you want something somewhat firm, likely you’ll need to get a firm mattress topper. I need to point out that their customer service really shines. They were prompt, friendly, and understanding. They go above and beyond to give a good explanation and are very reasonable when trying to resolve your issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for the price
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable bed for the price. Worth every penny so far

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this mattress for my son. He loves how comfortable it is and it was a very affordable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Using this mattress for 3 months now love it just as decribed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The mattress is great
reviews.reviewText: I have great sleep on this mattress I like the support and comfort I would recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Springs are 11 of the 12 inches
reviews.reviewText: DO NOT BUY! The springs of this mattress measure 11 inches tall with approximately 1 inch of thin padding on top. I’m not joking - I actually measured the springs and they’re 11 inches high. I allowed it to expand the full 72 hours before laying on the mattress and was shocked when the springs were pushing right through into my skin (and I only weigh 135 lbs). In addition, parts of the mattress were firm, others were indented. Also, the springs are fairly noisy as you move around. There was no possible way an adult could comfortably sleep on this mattress. I wondered how this mattress could have any positive reviews - then I found out when the company contacted me offering to pay if you remove the negative review! There are plenty of better mattresses out there, don’t waste your time on this one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and well made
reviews.reviewText: This is a very well made mattress. It's pretty heavy to maneuver by yourself though. I sleep well on it and don't burn up like others I have tried. It's rated as firm but is more a medium. I'd buy this for anyone in my family without hesitation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product for the price
reviews.reviewText: Overall, this seems like a nice mattress for the price. We opened it up and let it sit out for several days as instructed. I appreciated that the foam did not have a bad odor as we have tried other products that smelled for a few days after opening the package. After the mattress expanded, it looked nice and seemed to be good quality. The fabric on the top did have a few rolls that didn’t flatten out as well as I had hoped as well as the side fabric not being as tight as I hoped it would be after the 72 hour expansion. The workmanship, stitching and feel of the mattress is very nice. My daughter has been sleeping on it for a week now and she thinks it’s really comfortable. The mattress seems to be on the softer side of medium firm which our daughter likes. My only concern is if it will be supportive enough as she gets older and bigger. Overall for the price, think this is a good option when considering the fast shipping, no bad smells and nice workmanship of the mattress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Best mattress I have ever slept on. Far better than the expensive alternatives I have bought in the past. Nice and firm but comfortable as well. It squases if I sit right on the edge but not if I sit on it properly. I love it and go to bed earlier to be comfortable. My back feels so much better after only sleeping on it for a couple of weeks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Amazingly soft and supportive sleep,only had it a few nights but so far so good. Delivered earlier than expected also, so great company to deal with..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've only had it for 3 days but so far it's perfect as far as comfort. I've noticed my body has no aches after a nights sleep, whereas with my old mattress I often felt awful aches & pains after sleeping for 8+ hours. The only flaw is that there's no handles on the sides to make it easier to maneuver the mattress, but that isn't a big deal. I can tell it's an extremely well-made mattress that will last for a long time. It also comes with a 10 year warranty (which can be extended by 2 years if you register the product within 14 days of purchase on the TeQsli website).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I moved into a furnished flat a few months ago and have been struggling to get a decent sleep on the mattress that was included with the place when we moved in. I hadn't bought a mattress without testing it previously, but this one looked good and sounded good so I thought it was worth a shot.I had read reviews of other mattresses and had seen that people made comments that occasionally they were smells or they took a long time to reinflate. Once opened, I can happily say that neither of these were the case with this mattress. When I opened it, it exploded with great aplomb nearly taking out myself and the TV. Be careful when you open it! It expanded very quickly and was ready to lay on within about half an hour. You can see that I set it up initially on top of my existing mattress as I was expecting it to take a while to expand but that wasn't the case.There's absolutely no smell from it at all. It just smells like a mattress, which is ideal.Somehow it manages to be both very cushy and soft but also supportive. I am a side and occasional stomach sleeper and it suits both of these positions well. When on my side my shoulder and my hip will somewhat sink into the mattress, but the pillow doesn't, which is again ideal and means that my spine stays straight and supported. It is cushy to sleep on your stomach so of course that's very comfortable if that's your thing.I was concerned about whether the mattress would be hot because of the memory foam component, but it's no more warm than any other pillow top mattress I've ever used. It's soft and plush but not sweaty even in this summer heat.All said I would definitely recommend this mattress. I think it's well worth it's cost and I have been sleeping soundly since purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Around 4 months ago I purchased our first TeQsli mattress, the one with the bright orange trim. Was so impressed that we decided to replace all the mattresses in the house. Our plan was to buy a new one every month and by Christmas all would have been replaced. Times got a little bit tougher and the monthly purchase took 4 months. I clicked from by purchase history to buy it again and also thought I would see if they have pillows too. I didn't find pillows but I did notice this mattress. New and improved vibe from the add, so decided to purchase this instead. Dimensions are the same but definitely feel different, I am guessing that the springs are different. Very comfy and with the same warranty. The only issue is that now everyone wants the black mattress. Can really recommend TeQsli and will be buying again 3 more before Christmas.
